author: zach-folwick
body:
Requires:
MI_SessionFT to be fully implemented

> needs MI_OperationCallbacks
> needs MI_Boolean
> needs MI_Operation
> DestinationOptions
> DestinationOptionsFT
> DestinationOptions struct

comments.author: zach-folwick
comments.body: It appears as though someone had an idea to implement the MI_OperationCallbacks, and are doing it in a different way.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Can you expand on this? `NewSession` of what? `CimSession` or `PSSession`? I think the former but the title doesn't say.

title: Implement NewSession
